data.title: Arnold Schwarzenegger Museum
data.text:
Bodybuilder, Mister Universe, actor, governour, the life of Arnold Schwarzenegger cannot be summed up in one word! But before setting out in the world and becoming the most famous Austrian alive – he spend his youth growing up in „Thal“ a town close to Graz. And his birthplace now hosts the only official Arnold Schwarzenegger Museum worldwide!

„Come with me if you want to live” - and see the museum ;-)

We will get to the museum by public transport (Bus 40 from „Jakominiplatz“ and Bus 48 from „Graz Gösting“ to „Thal Thalersee“). The event ends after the guided tour – so you can decide on your own how and when you want to go back. Public transport tickets are not included!

It will take us about 10min uphill from the bus stop to get to the museum.

Please be very punctual, because of the bus schedule, we won’t be able to wait for you! We would miss our connection bus which only runs every half an hour!

HARD FACTS:

MEETING POINT: 03:00 p.m. sharp at Jakominiplatz, in front of Bus Stop Line 40 (in front of McDonalds)

SIGN-UP: during the office hours starting on the 22nd of May 2024

PRICE:

4€ with ESNcard

7€ without ESNcard

WHAT`s included: ticket and guided tour

not included:

tickets for public transport from Jakominplatz to the museum and back are your own responsibility
